title: Love's Haven
description: He offered her baby a life of privilege, instead of the abject poverty Mara Rosemond remembered from her own childhood. But at what cost? Brock Barnett had been her husband's best friend. Mara blamed him for her husband's death. Even so, the bond that grew between them was unimaginable--yet undeniable--as both fought a battle with their emotions. Though Mara feared forsaking her late husband's memory, she knew that for her baby the future was everything.
author: Catherine  Palmer
